cab.content: /TO BE KEPT TJHDER LQCK MD KEY.It is requested that special care$ may "be taken to ensure ifaesecrecy of this Document.SECRET. COPY HO.W.P. (Vo) W-WAR CABINET.A R M Y.Twenty-second Weekly Report(For the period 29th January to 4th February, 194-0)1. France.Preparatory to the arrival of the Third Corps the frontage heldby the 3.E.F. has been extended towards the sea to include the sectorARMENTIERES - BAILLEUL. It is unlikely, however, that the French units in this sector will be relieved for another ten days.2. Movement to B.E.F.The following were shipped to B.E.F. from the United kingdom during the week :-Personnel 20,441Vehicles 2,094Stores andAmmunition 9,749 tons.Included in the above were -(a) Completion of move of 51st Division.' (b) " " " " 50th Division.(c) 11 General Construction Companies.(d) 2 Artisan Works Companies,THE WAR OFFICE.5th February, 1940.
